name: The Vermin Protectors
description:
A Game Jam+ Game!

The humans have littered your forest once again for you to pick up!

Play as the grumpy Racoon, Rubble, and the genius rat, Riff-Raff, as you drive around as a "guardian" in a autumn filled forest with Riff-Raffs homemade car and fishing rod picking up the trash!
Keep making your forest clean and pretty again for everyones sake!

Theme:
Nature Protectors and Local super hero.

Diversifiers:
Minimal control, Statue

 #Mobile #Socialimpact 

The Team:
David Byström
Lukas Lagerholm
Tobias Jacobsson
Sigurd Nordberg
Erik Larsson
Jonathan Ohlsson
Made in Skövde, Sweden. Created with Unity Engine.
Assets and software:
Unity Engine
FMOD
Audacity
Ableton Live 10
Photoshop
Blur Postprocessing Effect -
https://www.ronja-tutorials.com/2018/08/27/postprocessing-blur.html
Soundsnap (birdsong audioeffect) -
